SEARCH
Package fr.uge.patchwork

Class Table

java.lang.Object
fr.uge.patchwork.Table
public class Table extends Object
Class representing the Tab object. It allows you to group the patch laying board as well as the board on which the players can move.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Table(int[] array, int[][] arrayPlayer)
    Constructor for Tab object, who initialize an integer array, a number 0 for player1 and player2, and a state false for reverse (to know which player is in front of the other).

  • Constructor Details

    • Table

      public Table(int[] array, int[][] arrayPlayer)
      Constructor for Tab object, who initialize an integer array, a number 0 for player1 and player2, and a state false for reverse (to know which player is in front of the other).
      Parameters:
      array - : Integer array of one dimension. (main game board)
      arrayPlayer - : Integer array of two dimension. (game board for player to put patch)

  • Method Details

    • createmap

      public Table createmap()
      Method to initialize game board, by placing the players in their starting position, place the buttons as well as the pieces of fabric.
      Returns:
      Table : new Table Array.

    • event

      public static void event(int pos, int[] array, List<Integer> arrayEvent)
      Static method to adds to an integer list the different events of the game board.
      Parameters:
      pos - : (int) Position in the board game.
      array - : (int[]) Main board game.
      arrayEvent - : (List) arrayEvent which will contains the different event of the game board.

    • Pawnexchanger

      public static void Pawnexchanger(int pos, int[] array)
      Static method that puts the element back in place once the player has passed it.
      Parameters:
      pos - : (int) position in the board game.
      array - : (int[]) Main board game.

    • distancePawn

      public static int distancePawn(int player, boolean inc, int distance)
      Static method that calculates the distance between the two players pieces.
      Parameters:
      player - : (int) integer representing one of the two players.
      inc - : (boolean) boolean indicating if player 1 and in front or behind player 2.
      distance - : (int) integer representing the actual distance between the two players pieces.
      Returns:
      int : (int) integer that representing the distance between players.

    • changeReverse

      public static boolean changeReverse(int player)
      Static method to change the 'reverse' variable according to the player.
      Parameters:
      player - : (int) integer who represent the player.
      Returns:
      boolean : (boolean) Returns true if the player if the player 1 and otherwise false.

    • overlay

      public static void overlay(int[] array, int[] arrayPawn, int pos, int player, int otherPlayer, int distance)
      Method that changes the main game board in case of overlapping players.
      Parameters:
      array - : (int[]) integer array 1D that representing the game board.
      arrayPawn - : (int) integer array 1D who contains players.
      pos - : (int) integer that representing the position of a player.
      player - : (int) integer representing a player.
      otherPlayer - : (int) integer representing the other player.
      distance - : (int) integer representing the actual distance between the two players.

    • pawnCase

      public void pawnCase(int player, int caseforward, int otherPlayer, List<Integer> arrayOfEvent)
      method advancing players' counters within a circular array of integer according to the steps to be taken.
      Parameters:
      player - : (int) integer who represent the player.
      caseforward - : (int) number of steps to be taken.
      otherPlayer - : (int) integer who represent the other player.
      arrayOfEvent - : (List) List who represent the list of event.

    • Pion

      public ArrayList<Integer> Pion(int caseforward, int player)
      Method that calls the move function of the counters in the game board.
      Parameters:
      caseforward - : (int) number of steps to be taken.
      player - : (int) integer who represent the player.
      Returns:
      ArrayList : (ArrayList) list of all event in the game board.

    • verificationofpos

      public static boolean verificationofpos(int[][] array, Patch patch, int line, int column)
      Method that verifies that the patch is placed in an authorized location.
      Parameters:
      array - : (int[][]) who representing a main board.
      patch - : (Patch) patch the player has purchased.
      line - : (int) integer who represent line of game board.
      column - : (int) integer who represent column of game board.
      Returns:
      boolean : false if your are out of game board and if you are in the game board.

    • verificationLimitTab

      public static boolean verificationLimitTab(int direction, int[][] tabReference)
      Method which checks if the direction in which we are going is not outside the table.
      Parameters:
      direction - : (int) integer who represent the direction that the player enter.
      tabReference - : (int) integer (2D) array who represent the game board.
      Returns:
      boolean : (boolean) return true if position is incorrect or false if is it correct position.

    • patchWantedMoveOnTable

      public static void patchWantedMoveOnTable(String scanner, int[] coord, int[][] tab)
      Method that allows you to place a patch on a patch tray during a game.
      Parameters:
      scanner - : (Scanner) Browse a stream and retrieve its content.
      coord - : (int[]) array int 1D which representing the coord x, y from a direction.
      tab - : (tab[][]) array int 2D which representing the game board patch of a player.

    • patchWantedRotationOnTable

      public static Patch patchWantedRotationOnTable(Patch patch, String scanner, int[] coord)
      Method that performs actions on a patch (rotation right/left and reverse)
      Parameters:
      patch - : (Patch) Object that representing a Patch.
      scanner - : (Scanner) Browse a stream and retrieve its content.
      coord - : (int[]) array int 1D which representing the coord x, y from a direction.
      Returns:
      Patch : (Patch) new patch resulting from a rotation or reserve.

    • pushpatch

      public boolean pushpatch(Patch patch, Scanner scanner)
      Method to push the patch in the game board of the player. Returns true if we put the patch and false if we go back.
      Parameters:
      patch - : (Patch) patch the player has purchased.
      scanner - : (Scanner) Browse a stream and retrieve its content.
      Returns:
      boolean : (boolean) Returns true if we put the patch and false if we go back.
